Title: Shadow Step
Feature: Teleports the user a short distance, leaving behind a shadowy afterimage.

Title: Eclipse
Feature: Reduces enemy vision range and weakens their attacks.

Title: Shadow Cloak
Feature: Grants the user invisibility for a short period of time.

Title: Dark Pulse
Feature: Fires a pulse of dark energy that causes enemies to take damage and be weakened.

Title: Nightmare
Feature: Induces fear in enemies, causing them to flee from the user in panic.
